title: UK survey : when most consumers will start their Christmas shopping in the UK in 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Months.
The Share of respondents is highest at Month November and lowest at Month The week before Christmas.
The Share of respondents of Month The week before Christmas is 15.5% smaller than the maximum value at November.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Month November and lowest at Month The week before Christmas.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Months.
The Share of respondents is highest at Month November and lowest at Month The week before Christmas.
The Share of respondents of Month The week before Christmas is 15.5% smaller than the maximum value at November.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Share of respondents in each Month on the y axis.
Month November has the highest Share of respondents and The week before Christmas has the lowest Share of respondents.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Month Alredy bought presents.
The highest Month November has 29.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Month The week before Christmas.
Month November is higher than any other Months with value 31.0, followed by Alredy bought presents, and December. Down to Month The week before Christmas with the lowest value 2.0.
The Share of respondents has decreased over the past 6 Months.
Month October, and December have the same Share of respondents.
The average Share of respondents in all 6 Months is 16.67.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 100.0.
